text.title: B.B. King's daughters allege blues musician was poisoned
text.head: B.B. King's daughters allege blues musician was poisoned
Sources

list.item: "BB King's death to be investigated as homicide, Nevada coroner's office says" — ABC News (Australia) , May 26, 2015
"BB King: estate attorney dismisses claim that bluesman was poisoned" — The Guardian , May 26, 2015
Drew Mackie. "Allegations B.B. King Was Poisoned Are Ridiculous, Says Attorney" — TIME , May 25, 2015
